title: Win It Weekly: Reynolds ATR Gravel Wheelset
content:
Win It Weekly: Reynolds ATR Gravel Wheelset

How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a Reynolds ATR gravel wheelset.

Prize:

  • Reynolds ATR gravel wheelset
  • MSRP US$1,349.99

Prize Details:

The Reynolds ATR wheels are made to maximize performance for gravel riding. This wheel is built on a robust, 23mm wide-profile carbon fiber rim to fit larger all-terrain tires. The 40mm deep rim gives you a highly stable aerodynamic advantage as speeds rise, but maintains stiffness. The Allroads hub delivers quick power transfer with just 5 degrees of engagement and minimal rolling resistance. So, whether youâ€™re doing a day of exploring, trying to get lost on the backroads, or going for a multiday adventure, the Reynolds ATR wheels are ready to conquer All Terrain Roads.
